name: Non-Aggresion Pact
description: Signing this Treaty will prevent both Empires from fighting skirmishes in neutral Territories.

name: Military Alliance
description: Signing this Treaty will make it free for the other Empire to declare War on your own enemies.

name: Cartography Exchange
description: Signing this Treaty will reveal to each Empire the Tiles already discovered by the other.

name: Vision Exchange
description: Signing this Treaty will show each Empire the Tiles over which the other has vision.

name: Shared Research
description: Signing this Treaty will provide Science bonuses to Cities in both Empires and make Technologies discovered by one Empire cost 20% less for the other Empire.

name: Deeper Collaboration
description: Signing this Treaty will provide an additional Science bonus to Cities in both Empires and make Technologies cost another 20% less.

name: Immigration Policy
description: Signing this Treaty will allow each Empire to grow the other Empire's available Population.

name: Shared Victory
description: Signing this Treaty will allow one Empire to also be declared victorious should the other Empire earn Victory. This excludes Conquest and Score victories.
